tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MalwareBehavior (
    malware_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    malware_name VARCHAR(255),
    behavior_pattern TEXT,
    detection_date DATE,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE behavior_patterns (
    behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_name TEXT,
    pattern_description TEXT,
    sample_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES malware_samples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE malware_patterns (
    pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_name VARCHAR(255),
    detection_rate FLOAT,
    behavior_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (behavior_id) REFERENCES malware_behaviors(behavior_id)
);

CREATE TABLE malware_analysis_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_id INT,
    pattern_id INT,
    result_score FLOAT,
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES malware_files(file_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (pattern_id) REFERENCES malware_patterns(pattern_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BehavioralPatterns (
    pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_description TEXT,
    related_malware_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    pattern_score INT
);
